text: Mikkel Kallesøe Andreasen (born 20 April 1997) is a Danish professional footballer who plays as a right back for Randers FC. ==Club career== ===Randers FC=== Kallesøe got promoted to the first team squad at the age of 17 in the summer 2014, after signing a three-year professional- and full-time contract with Randers. On 26 October 2014, Kallesøe got his debut for Randers FC at the age of 17. Kallesøe started on the bench, but replaced Kasper Fisker in the 80nd minute in a 3–0 victory against OB. In October 2016 in a game between Lyngby Boldklub and Randers, Kallesøe suffered a horrible concussion, which was the fifth concussion in his career. The concussion kept Kallesøe sidelined for 6 months and was close to make an end of his football career. Since this incident, Kallesøe has played with either a helmet or a special headband. ====On loan to Viborg FF==== On 31 August 2017, Kallesøe was loaned out to Viborg FF for the rest of 2017. Kallesøe played 12 games for Viborg the first half year. Viborg wanted to keep the player, but both the player and Randers FC rejected that, and he returned to Randers. ==References== ==External links== * Mikkel Kallesøe on randersfc.dk * * Mikkel Kallesøe on DBU Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Danish footballers Category:Danish Superliga players Category:Randers FC players Category:Denmark youth international footballers Category:People from Lemvig
title: Mikkel Kallesøe
